text: Ana maaŋ mbuim, Zisas khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nan kɨvntok, ndu mba muun za zɨgi bigeŋ, ndu vhemkora nen muuŋ.” Ana maaŋ ana mbuim, mba gumgi hegap Zisasan suirigi. 26.50 Kha vezar mbe Grikar kaman nzuai kameŋ ne tuituigiap hɨgi fhuvara. Gumgi mbari, mbe Zisas suaŋgi kameŋ mbe ne dorgap khaŋ muuŋgiap ne nzuai, “Kɨvntok, ndu thaŋ nzuav zɨgi?”
